analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#90-91) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#94-97)

Reentrancy in Dividend._CalcDiv (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#409-434):
	External calls:
	- receivedDividends >= crowdSaleContract.hardCapDividends() (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#413-434)
	- lengthArrInvesotrs = token.getInvestorsCount() (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#414-415)
	- crowdSaleContract.lockTransfer(true) (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#415-417)
	- k = receivedDividends.mul(myAround).div(token.totalSupply()) (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#417-419)
	- crowdSaleContract.lockTransfer(false) (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#431-434)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- receivedDividends (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#434)

Reentrancy in CrowdSale._saleTokens (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#554-581):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#574-577)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentFunds (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#578-580)

CrowdSale._saleTokens (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#554-581) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#574-577)

Dividend._CalcDiv has external calls inside a loop:
	- invAddress = token.getInvestorAddress(i) (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#426-427)

Dividend._CalcDiv has external calls inside a loop:
	- myProfit = token.balanceOf(invAddress).mul(k).div(myAround) (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#427-428)

Reentrancy in Dividend._CalcDiv (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#409-434):
	External calls:
	- receivedDividends >= crowdSaleContract.hardCapDividends() (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#413-434)
	- lengthArrInvesotrs = token.getInvestorsCount() (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#414-415)
	- crowdSaleContract.lockTransfer(true) (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#415-417)
	- k = receivedDividends.mul(myAround).div(token.totalSupply()) (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#417-419)
	- invAddress = token.getInvestorAddress(i) (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#426-427)
	- myProfit = token.balanceOf(invAddress).mul(k).div(myAround) (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#427-428)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- divmap (/unique_contracts/0x7ed7fe41f0e82f1bc95fd59b7cc1482f6ec3f4f2.sol#429-430)
